anya-e0806n4:2_0: Nanu ca ‘ṇo vāpacce’ti vacanato kathaṁ pakativisayāvagamo siyā. Yathākathañci pakativisayāvagamepi
anya-e0806n4:2_1: sāmaññavacanato pana dhammenāpaccantyādo yato kutoci dhammeniccāditopi siyā ṇā dipaccayotyāsaṅkiyāha
anya-e0806n4:2_3: pariggahaṇāya sāmaññavacanato yo apaccavā tato, atthato pana asambhavā dabbācakasaddāva
anya-e0806n4:2_4: sāmatthiyena chaṭṭhiyantā sabbaliṅgavacanā jāyateti viññātabbaṁ. Dhammasmāpaccaṁtyādīsu
anya-e0806n4:3_0: Dhammenāti dhammena karaṇabhūtena. Dhammāyāti dhammatthaṁ, dhammasmāti dhammahetunā,
anya-e0806n4:3_2: dhammenāpaccaṁ kassāti pucchitvā devadattassāti apekkhiyamānaṁ vadati. Devadattassāti
anya-e0806n4:3_3: apaccavā devadattādi apekkhīyateti sambandho, hisaddo hetumhi. Na hettha ṇādivutti
anya-e0806n4:3_4: aññattha nahetakāmantattha (potthake) sāpekkhattā kambalo vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṁ devadattassāti
anya-e0806n4:3_5: ettha pana vasiṭṭho-paccavāti tato chaṭṭhiyantā hoticcāsaṅkiyāha- ‘na ce’ccādi. Na
anya-e0806n4:4_0: Kāraṇamāha- ‘asambandhā’ti. Na hettha sambandho vasiṭṭhassa kambalāpekkhattena apaccassa
anya-e0806n4:4_2: apaccaṁ vāsiṭṭhoti ṇādivuttiyā bhāve sāmatthiyaṁ natthi, samatthañhi vasiṭṭhaṁ rājapurisādi
anya-e0806n4:5: Yadi panettha ṇādippaccayo sabbathā sambandhamapekkhate, tadā visesato yassāpaccena sambandho tatova janakato so siyāti dassetumāha- ‘yajjeva’miccādi.
anya-e0806n4:6_0: Yo janakoti yoyo yassa yassa apaccassa janako. Tatoyevāti tasmātasmā janakatoyeva.
anya-e0806n4:6_1: Siyāti tasmiṁ tasmiṁ apaccatthe ṇādippaccayo siyā. Tattha hetumāha- ‘tassevāpaccena
anya-e0806n4:6_2: yogā’ti. Yogāti apaccasambandhato, na mūlappakatitoti paramappakatito na hotīti vuttaṁ
anya-e0806n4:6_3: hoti. Hetumāha- ‘ayogā,ti, vacanābhāvampettha dassetuṁ ce’tyādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:7: Vacananti suttaṁ, sambandhābhāvā (tādisavacanābhāvā) ca mūlappakatito ṇādippaccayassābhāvaṁ dassetvā idāni mūlappakatitovāssābhimatabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘mūlappakatito’ccādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:8_2: vatvā taṁ sādhayitumārabhate ‘katha’miccādi, evaṁ hiccādi kathaṁpanidamiccādinā yathāvuttassa
anya-e0806n4:8_3: samattha navākyaṁ, hiyasmā taṁ disvā tathā pucchito devadattassavātiādinā uppādetārameva
anya-e0806n4:8_4: niddisati, nāttānaṁ pitāmaho, tasmā uppādetāyevāpaccena sambajjhati na pitāmahoti
anya-e0806n4:8_5: yojetvā adhippāyo veditabbo. Idaṁ yathāvuttamuppādetuniddisanaṁ, tena apaccena saddhiṁ
anya-e0806n4:8_6: uppādetuyeva janakasseva yogo sambandho paṭipādetuṁ na sakkāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:9_0: Tantitaṁ tattha-iti (pañcikāyaṁ) pucchānimittaṁ, tenāti apaccena. Apatananti narake
anya-e0806n4:9_1: apatanaṁ bhavati, soti yoso yassātyaniyamaniddiṭṭho so ñātuṁ na icchitoti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:9_2: Iminā idaṁ dīpeti- ‘‘napatatyanena naraketyapaccanti vuccati apaccenānena yassakassaci
anya-e0806n4:9_3: avisesenāpatanambhavati narake soso tāya pucchāya ñātuṁ na icchito’’ti. So vāti kassāyaṁ
anya-e0806n4:9_4: puttoti pucchāyānurodhane so uppādetāyeva ñātumicchitoti sambandho. Tusaddo cetthāpaccena
anya-e0806n4:9_5: narakāpātasabba janajānanicchāvisesajotako, yadi siyāti sambandho, attānampi niddiseyya
anya-e0806n4:9_6: na kevalamuppādetāraṁ, atthiccādi pitāmahassa attanopi niddese kāraṇavacanaṁ, taṁ
anya-e0806n4:9_7: apaccaṁ nimittaṁ kāraṇaṁ, yassa taṁ taṁnimittaṁ tasmā katvā (potthake) evaṁ diṭṭhiko
anya-e0806n4:10_0: Byavahitajanitenāpīti byavahitena kattunā janitenāpi, karaṇe cāyaṁ tatiyā, hetumhi
anya-e0806n4:10_1: vā. Kasmā evaṁ diṭṭhikoti āha ‘yaṁ nimittaṁ hi’ccādi. Hisaddo yasmādatthe. Yassāti
anya-e0806n4:10_2: pubbajassa, tena apaccena apatanaṁ tadapatanaṁ tato, idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘‘tena byavahitajanitenāpi
anya-e0806n4:10_3: pumunā pubbajopi narakaṁ na patati so pubbajassāpya paccaṁ bhavati yathāvuttena nibbacanenā’’ti.
anya-e0806n4:10_5: Pubba pubbabhāve satīti pubbassa pubbassa vijjamānatte sati. Byavahitena janite apaccepi
anya-e0806n4:10_6: nimittaṁ apāyāpatakāraṇabhāvo atthiye vāti sambandho. Kesanti āha-‘pubbesanti pubbajānanti
anya-e0806n4:10_7: attho, ke nāti āha- ‘pārampariyenā’ti. Abhedopacārenāti pubbapubbabhāve saticcādinā
anya-e0806n4:10_8: vuttanayena janakassa viya pārampariyenapubbesampinimittatā vato janakasadisattā
anya-e0806n4:10_9: janakāva nāma te siyunti evamabhedena upacaraṇato cintanatoti attho. Ubhayathāti
anya-e0806n4:10_10: ñāyena upacārenacāti ubhayena pakārena, evamubhayathāpi mūlappakatiyā paccenābhisambandhā
anya-e0806n4:11: Tato cāti mūlappakatito ca, apaccasāmaññavacanicchāyanti itthi punnapuṁsakattavisesopaggāhi apaccasāmaññassa vacanicchāyaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:12_0: Evammūlakatito- paccasāmaññena ṇādippaccayaṁ vavatthapetvā idāni apaccāditopi hoteva
anya-e0806n4:12_1: ṇādi sāmaññavidhānā. So ca bahulādhikārato gurujanāyattattā tanniyogācaraṇena pasatthe
anya-e0806n4:12_2: yevāpacce byavahitajanitepi itthivajjite siyāti dassetumāha ‘nattādīhi’ccādi. Satiyeva
anya-e0806n4:12_3: gurujane sappadhānabhāvena kucchite-paccetu nattādīvuttīhi vasiṭṭhādīhi ṇādippaccayo
anya-e0806n4:12_4: hoti vāsiṭṭhotiādi, itthiyañca na hoti vāsiṭṭhītiādi.
anya-e0806n4:13_0: Atthatoti sāmatthiyato. Apacce vidhīyamāno paccayo apaccavatā jāyamāno tassāpaccanti
anya-e0806n4:13_1: atthe jāyati. Socāya matthaviseso cha(ṭṭhiyanta) tābhāve kathaṁ siyāti idamettha
anya-e0806n4:13_2: sāmatthiyaṁ. Anantare vāpacce putte-bhidheyya nattādo vāpacce-bhidheyyāti sasambandho.
anya-e0806n4:13_3: Kutoci apaccavatā nattādo eva. Idañca sabbambahulavacaneva sampajjatīti āha- ‘bahulādhikārā’ti.
anya-e0806n4:13_4: Apacceti ekavacanena niddese pumunā napuṁsakena kariyati, tene kasmiṁ yevāpacce siyā,
anya-e0806n4:13_5: na bahūsu vasiṭṭhassāpaccāni vāsiṭṭhāni, na citthi vāsiṭṭhāni, na citthiyaṁ vāsiṭṭhītyāsaṅkiyāha-‘idañce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:13_6: Idañca apaccavacanañca. Iminā cettha tathā nissayakaraṇaṁ dasseti. Tassa vacanicchābhāvatoti
anya-e0806n4:14_0: Kiṁ pana kāraṇaṁ sutte liṅgavacanāvacanicchāyaṁ tassāppadhānattā yenakenaci liṅgādinā
anya-e0806n4:14_4: pume napuṁsakepacce-bhidheyye vidhi hoticcevaṁ kāriyappaṭipattiyā vattuṁ na iṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:15_0: Vacanantarepi aññasmiṁ vacane. Āṇīti ṇippaccayasuttaṁ vadati. Agottāditoti yogottassādibhūto
anya-e0806n4:15_1: na hoti, tato, teneva ‘‘āṇī’’ti sutte (4-5) vakkhati-‘akārantamattatovāyaṁṇina gottādibhūtato’ti.
anya-e0806n4:15_2: Vākyasamāsāpīti yathāsaṅkhyenāha. Tasmiṁ attheti tasmiṁ vākyopadassite atthe, tanti
anya-e0806n4:16_0: Satipanāti vākāre sati tu aniccattā ṇappaccayassa. Sopīti samāsopi, samāsotiādinā
anya-e0806n4:16_1: pakkhantaramāha. Tena vākyasijjhanena. Pakkhe vākyasamāsāpi siyunti pakkhe samāsavuttiyā
anya-e0806n4:16_2: eva bādhitattā pakkhantare ṇādivutti na bādhīyatīti vākyavuttiyopi siyunti attho.
anya-e0806n4:18_0: Vacchakaccādinā kaccādigaṇaṁ dassetvā tassa vibhāgena nipphattiṁ dassetuṁ ‘vacchādīhī’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n4:18_1: ‘‘Kaṇho brāhmaṇe’’ti gaṇasuttaṁ. Tattha kaṇhasaddo brāhmaṇe vattamāno ṇānaṇāya nappaccaye
anya-e0806n4:18_3: gaṇasuttaṁ, diccādīsūti yatoṇyo dissati ‘‘ṇya diccādīhī’’ti (4-4), te diccādayo,
anya-e0806n4:18_4: tesu pāṭhāti taṁsuttappadese ‘‘katā ṇiyove’’ti pāṭhābhāvepi diccā dīnamākatigaṇattā
anya-e0806n4:19_0: Ṇyeti ṇyappaccaye kate. Gottādisaddāti gotte vaṁse ādibhūtā saddā. Vaṁsoti anvayo.
anya-e0806n4:19_1: Soyeva gāvaṁ sajāti sādhāraṇaṁ vijātivinivattanaṁ sakaṭādivacanaṁ tāyatīti gottanti
anya-e0806n4:19_2: vuttaṁ, tenāha-‘gottaṁ vaṁso’ti. Tassāti gottassa, tassādayo gottādayoti seso. Kete
anya-e0806n4:19_3: gottādayoccāha- ‘saññākārino’ccādi. Vacchādayo nattādino apaccassa apaccaṁ tadapaccādi
anya-e0806n4:21_0: Ghapasaññantāvettha bhīyyo kattikādayoti gayhanti. Yadi panettha aññepi gayhanti,
anya-e0806n4:21_1: atthi paṇhiādayo keciyeva kattikādīsu antogadhā hontīti vattumāha- ‘etthā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:21_2: Vinatā supaṇṇamātā, tehīti vidhavādīhi. Vidhavādigaṇaṁ dasseti ‘bandhaka’ccādi. Vigato
anya-e0806n4:21_3: dhavo pati assāti vidhavā, bandhakī abhisāriṇī.
anya-e0806n4:23_0: Yassa ca cavaggoti sambandho, kevalaṁ gaggyoti ettakamevā dassetvā parasatthāgatagaggādigaṇekadesabhūtakuṇḍanīsaddatopi
anya-e0806n4:23_1: koṇḍaññoti mudāharanto so gaggādigaṇopyatrābhyupagatoti viññāpeti. Tasmā tasmiṁ gaggādikepi
anya-e0806n4:23_2: parasatthapaṭhite yoyo payogo āgame dissati vaccho aggivessoccādi. Sopīha veditabboti
anya-e0806n4:23_3: dassetumāha-‘gaggādi’ccādi. Gaggādīti gaggādi ayaṁ. Gottassa gaggavaṁsassa ādibhūtena
anya-e0806n4:23_4: gaggena upalakkhito gaṇo gottādigaṇo, tena gaggo nāma koci, tassatvapaccaṁ gaggīti
anya-e0806n4:23_5: bhavati. Paputtādovāti avadhāraṇaṁ gaggassāpaccaṁ gaggicceva yathāsiyāti.
anya-e0806n4:25_0: Pakatassāti ‘‘māgadhaṁ saddalakkhaṇa’’nti vā ‘‘nāmasmā’’ti vā pakatassa. Āti nāmavisesanesati
anya-e0806n4:25_1: ‘‘vidhibbisesanantassā’’ti tadanta vidhinā akāranto gayhatīti āha-‘visesanena cā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:27: Paccayantenāti rājaññoti paccayantena. Rājaññotīmassattho khattiyajātīti, rājaññajātīti attho. Rañño apaccaṁ rājāpaccaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:29_0: Samudāyenāti paccayantasamudāyena, jātiyanti manussajātiyaṁ. Jātisaddāeteti idaṁ
anya-e0806n4:29_1: manusso mānusoti ettha apaccatthābhāve hetuvacanaṁ. Apaccattho ettha natthevāti ca
anya-e0806n4:29_2: idaṁ visuṁ manussamānusa saṅkhātassa paccatthassābhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Ṇovāti
anya-e0806n4:29_3: manuno apaccanti atthe‘‘ṇo vāpacce’’ti (4-1) ṇappaccayova. Na jātīti byatirekamāha.
anya-e0806n4:31: Rājasambandheti raññeti vuttarājasambandhe. Pañcālānaṁ khattiyānaṁ apaccaṁ, pañcālānaṁ janapadānaṁ rājāti vā evamettha vi(bhāgo) veditabbo okkākānaṁ apaccaṁ rājā vā okkāko.
anya-e0806n4:33_1: kusumbhādināti (vuttaṁ) siyā, rañji aya matthi abhisaṅge‘bhojane ratto’ti. Atthi
anya-e0806n4:33_2: vaṇṇavisese ‘rattogo’ti, lohitotyattho, atthi sukkasaja vaṇṇantarāpādane‘ratto paṭo’ti.
anya-e0806n4:33_3: Iha tu tatiye-tthe vattamāno gayhatīti vuttaṁ- ‘vaṇṇantaramāpādita’nti. Rāgāti.
anya-e0806n4:34_0: Atthaggahaṇanti atthappadhānattā niddesassa vuttaṁ. Tañcācariyāna mupadesato avicchinnā
anya-e0806n4:34_1: (cariya) pārampariyāvagamyate, rāgāti kasāva saṅkhātaatthaniddeso. Tenāti paṭassa
anya-e0806n4:34_2: rattabhāve rāgassa karaṇaniddeso, rattanti paccayatthaniddeso, paccayo cāyaṁ kasā
anya-e0806n4:34_3: vatthato bhavatyasambhavā, tena sutte rāgāti vuttepi tabbācakā kasāvasaddāti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n4:34_4: rāgāti pana tenāti rāgasseva niddiṭṭhepi tabbhāvenā tabbāvakabhāvenā-ti bhavitabbaṁ
anya-e0806n4:34_5: ttho niddiṭṭho, tabbācakā ca honto‘tena ratta’nti atthe hotīti kasāvena rattanti
anya-e0806n4:34_6: viññāyatīti rāgavācino tatiyantattaṁ sampajjati, tena ‘ṇa rāgā tena ratta’nti vuttepi
anya-e0806n4:34_7: labbhamānatthavasena vuttaṁ- ‘rāgavācitatiyantato’ti. Sutte pana rāgena rattantetasmiṁ
anya-e0806n4:34_8: atthe rāgā rāgavācīsaddā tatiyantā ṇappaccayo hotīti attho. Abhidhānatoti upacāravasena
anya-e0806n4:36_0: Tatiyantato vijjhatthaṁ tenāti anuvattateti sambandho. Sutte ayamattho ‘‘induyuttena
anya-e0806n4:36_1: nakkhattena lakkhito ce kālo, tadā tena lakkhite kāletyasmiṁ atthe tatiyantato nakkhattā
anya-e0806n4:36_2: ṇo hotī’’ti. Suttavivaraṇe tu tañcetyādikamadhippāyavasena vuttaṁ. Tenātyanuvuttiyā
anya-e0806n4:36_3: tatiyantatoti labbhati nakkhattenāti sutattāti, kāleti pana atthaniddesato ṇappaccayādheyyassa
anya-e0806n4:36_4: kālo ādhāroti viññāyatīti ‘lakkhite kāle’ti vuttaṁ, visessagatavibhattiyā vicāritāya
anya-e0806n4:36_5: visesana gatā ca (vicāritā) nāmāti āha- ‘nakkhattene’ticcādi, iha keci khandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0806n4:36_6: kiriyāsabhāvamicchanti aniccaṁ, apare tu dabbasabhāvaṁ niccaṁ. Tasso bhayassapi kālassa
anya-e0806n4:36_7: candayuttena phussādinā lakkhiyabhāvā lakkhaṇe tatiyā yuttanti vattumāha- ‘kiriyā rūpo kālo’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:37_0: Visesāvasāyoti kālassa visesāvadhāraṇatthameva hi ‘phussī ratti’ccādi. Loke payujjate.
anya-e0806n4:37_1: Gurunāti ettha guru jīvo, na nakkhattaṁ, candayuttatā panettha atthi… candayuttena
anya-e0806n4:37_2: gurunā rattiyā lakkhitattā. Kattikāya lakkhito muhuttoti ettha candaṁ vinā kattikāya
anya-e0806n4:37_3: tu kevalāya muhutto kālo lakkhito ‘kattikā muhutto’ti. Phussena lakkhitā atthasiddhīti
anya-e0806n4:37_4: ettha phusseninduyuttena atthasiddhi lakkhitā na kālo phussoti. Nakkhattayuttassa
anya-e0806n4:37_5: kālassa ratyādivisesāparāmāsena nakkhattavācito uppannassa paccayassa suttantarena
anya-e0806n4:37_6: lopaṁ vidhāya puna aññena suttena yuttāti desavidhānena sakaliṅgasaṅkhyāyuttehi-ṭṭhamabhidhānaṁ
anya-e0806n4:38_0: Ratyādivisesāparāmāsenāti phussī ratti phusso ahoti evaṁ ratyādivisesassa aparāmāsena
anya-e0806n4:38_1: asammassena aggahaṇena. Sakaliṅgasaṅkhyāyuttenāti phussakattikādīnaṁ yaṁyaṁ liṅgaṁ
anya-e0806n4:38_2: yāyā saṅkhyā, attaniyehi tehi tehi liṅgehi tāhitāhi ca saṅkhyāhi yuttena nakkhattasaddena.
anya-e0806n4:38_3: Na tadupalakkhito kāloti kattikā saddobahuvacananto bahutārakattā kattikāya, tāyakattikāya
anya-e0806n4:38_5: ko doso ye nevamuccateccāha- ‘ajjeti’ccādi. Iminā ca paramate doso ubbhāvito, tadatthatte
anya-e0806n4:39_0: Sattamī siyāti nakkhattasaddā taddhitalopantā phussena pāyasaṁ bhuñjeyya, phusse
anya-e0806n4:39_1: pāyasaṁ bhuñjeyyā’tyādo ādheyyantarāpekkhā siyā sattamī, yā suttantarena vidhīyati
anya-e0806n4:39_3: ‘ajjakattikāsū’ti, na paṭhamā. Paṭhamāyeva panāyaṁ payogo ‘ajjakattikā,ti. Ajjetyadhikaraṇappadhāno
anya-e0806n4:39_4: ahorattakālavācī saddo, kattikāsaddopi taddhitalopena takkālābhidhāyako, tato yevaubhinnampisāmānādhikaraṇyā
anya-e0806n4:39_5: kattikāyopyadhikaraṇaṁ sampajjante, tañca na vinādheyyena hotītyādheyyantarāpekkhāyaṁ
anya-e0806n4:39_6: tesu sattamīyeva siyā, na paṭhamā (upa) pajjeyyātyadhippāyo. Attanodāni dassane sattamiyā
anya-e0806n4:39_8: sattamiyā appasaṅgamāha. Evañcarahi vacanamantarena paresaṁ viya sattamīvidhāyakaṁ
anya-e0806n4:39_9: kathaṁ kattikāya jātoccāsaṅkiya tampaṭipādetumāha- ‘kattikāya jāto’ccādi. Bahuvacanantattepi
anya-e0806n4:39_10: kattikāya jātiyameka vacanantaṁ. Pakārantaramāha- ‘lopoti’ccādi. Lopenāti kattikāhi
anya-e0806n4:39_11: induyuttāhi lakkhito kāloti viggayha kataṇappaccayassa lopena.
anya-e0806n4:41_0: Seti paṭhamantāti sāti niddiṭṭhapaṭhamantā, yaṁ paṭhamantanti sāceti dassitaṁ paṭhamantamāha.
anya-e0806n4:41_1: Paṭhamantassa devatāpuṇṇamāsittabhāvato tadatthamabhedenāha- ‘sā’ti. Kā sā devatāccāha-
anya-e0806n4:41_2: ‘lokappasiddhāyeva devatā’ti. Yāgasampadānampi loke devatāti pasiddhanti yāgassa
anya-e0806n4:41_3: yajitabbassa puroḍāsādino sampadānampi paṭiggāhako pindādi loke deyyassa puroḍāsādino
anya-e0806n4:41_4: devatā sāmīti pasiddhantyattho, indo devatā assa indaṁ, ādicco devatā assa ādiccaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:42_0: Mantathomanīyampi devatāti pasiddhanti yena manthena yo thūyate so tassa mantassa
anya-e0806n4:42_1: devatā sāmīti loke pasiddhantyattho mahindo yamo varuṇo devatā assāti viggaho. Vuttanaya
anya-e0806n4:42_2: mevāti ‘‘nakkhatteninduyuttena kāle’’ti sutte vuttanayameva. Jātyekavacanaṁ maghāyāti,
anya-e0806n4:42_3: tārakarūpānampana bahuttā maghāsaddo bahuvacananto. Pāṇinīyā ‘‘sāsmiṁ puṇṇamāsīti
anya-e0806n4:42_4: saññāya’’nti (4-2-21) suttayitvā phussī puṇṇamāsī asmiṁ phusso māso phusso addhamāso
anya-e0806n4:42_5: phusso saṁvaccharoti saññāyaṁ paṭipādenti, tena tesaṁ phussī puṇṇamāsī asmiṁ pañcadasaratteti
anya-e0806n4:42_6: ettha ca bhatakamāse ca taddhito na bhavati. Idha pana ‘saññāya’nti vacanābhāve bhatakamāsepi
anya-e0806n4:42_7: chaṭṭhyatthe bhavatītyāsaṅka viracayati ‘bhatakamāsepi’ccādi. Puṇṇo mā iccatra māsaddo
anya-e0806n4:42_8: candapariyāyoti āha- ‘māsaddene’ccādi. Puṇṇo mā assanti nibbacanāti ettha puṇṇamāsīsaddassa
anya-e0806n4:42_9: puṇṇo mā assanti nīharitvā vacanāti attho. Vuttiyā atthassa phuṭīkaraṇāya vuttaṁ-
anya-e0806n4:42_10: ‘so puṇṇo tiādi. Tassanti puṇṇamāsiyaṁ. Sāpuṇṇamāsī, bhatakassa bhatiyā kammakārakassa
anya-e0806n4:42_11: yo tiṁsati ratto māso paribbayaniyamito, tassa sambandhinī neti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:43_0: Yassañcatithīyanti aniyamena paṭipadādimāha. Atoeva ca nipātanāti imasmāva nipātanā,
anya-e0806n4:43_1: tenevāha- ‘sutte vacanameva nipātana’nti. Māsasutiyāccādo sādhippāyamatthaṁ vivarati
anya-e0806n4:43_2: ‘yadipi’ccādinā. Assāti sāmaññavacanepi ‘sāssa devatā puṇṇamāsī’ti sutte assāti avisesavacanepi
anya-e0806n4:43_3: soyeva puṇṇamāsīsadde sūyamāno māsoyeva chaṭṭhyattho viññāyatīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:44_0: Pañcadasarattādoti paresaṁ saññāgahaṇena nivattitapañcadasarattādo. Atha addhamāsasaṁvaccharānampi
anya-e0806n4:44_1: udāharaṇatte nopaññāso kasmā na katoccāha- ‘addhamāsasaṁvaccharāna’miccādi. Evammaññate
anya-e0806n4:44_3: saṁvacchare phussena māsena sambandhā phussotyupacārīyate, yathā ca phussādimāsassa
anya-e0806n4:44_4: sambandhī addhamāso phusso addhamāsotyupacārīyate , na panojukanti tesamudāharaṇatte nānupādāna’’nti.
anya-e0806n4:46_0: Nākaḍḍhanatthoti ṇassākaḍḍhanattho na hoti. Yadyākaḍḍhanattho assa, tadā cānukaḍḍhitaṁ
anya-e0806n4:46_1: nottaratrānukaḍḍheyyāti maññate, kociyeva hotīti hontīti ito bhinditvā ānetabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:46_2: Tadā desassāti iminā ‘‘tadādesā taggahaṇena gayhantī’’ti paribhāsamupalakkheti. Katayādesassāpīti
anya-e0806n4:46_3: kato yādeso yassa tassa katayādesassāpīti. Ikārassāti yādesato pubbe ikārassa, iminā
anya-e0806n4:46_4: cādesādesīnamabhedo dassito. Tasadde nekenāpi paccekābhisambandhe siddheti evamaññate-
anya-e0806n4:46_5: ‘‘yathā’tena kataṁkīta’ (4-29) ntyādisutte ekova tasaddo bahūhi paccayattehi sambajjhate,
anya-e0806n4:46_7: tasmā kimetadatthena dvitaggahaṇene’’ti. Dvitaggahaṇe payojanattayaṁ vuttaṁ, tattha
anya-e0806n4:47_0: Tattha-‘yo yamadhīte jānāti cā’ti iminā dvitaggahaṇābhāve paccayatthāvayavassa samuccayappasaṅgamāha.
anya-e0806n4:47_1: Samuccaye sati(yo) yamadhīte jānāti ca, tattheva siyā, yo panādhīte kevalaṁ, na (jānāti)
anya-e0806n4:47_2: tattha na siyāti bodhayituṁ byabhicāramāha‘na paccekāti sambandhene’ti. Yathā ‘‘tena
anya-e0806n4:47_3: kathaṁ kīta’’miccādo ‘‘tena jitaṁ jayati’’ccādi paccekasambandhena bhavati evammāviññāyīti
anya-e0806n4:47_4: yatheccādi kassāttho. ‘Tena kataṁ kīta’’miccādīhi avatvā ‘‘tena jitaṁ jayati’’ccādisuttekadesavacanamatthabyatti
anya-e0806n4:47_5: tathā vutte hotīti vuttaṁ, tena jitamiccādo jayanādikā kiriyāne kadabbasamavāyittena
anya-e0806n4:47_6: pasiddhāti yutto tattha paccekābhisambandho, nevamajjhena vedanā pyekadabbasamavāyittābhiyyotyadhippāyo.
anya-e0806n4:48_0: Idāni dutiyaṁ dasseti ‘jānana’miccādi, nimitta miṭṭhāniṭṭhabodhakāraṇaṁ muhutto kattikādi,
anya-e0806n4:48_2: Jānanasāmaññeti nimittādīnaṁ jānana sāmaññe. ‘Yathāvuttajānanassa ajjhena visayatte
anya-e0806n4:48_3: hetumāha- ‘taṁ jānātīti tasaddena adhīyamānaparāmasato’ti. Tatiyaṁ dasseti ‘yato
anya-e0806n4:48_4: ce’ccādinā. Yato ca uppannena vidhinā ajjhena ñātu abhidhānampasiddhanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n4:48_5: potthakesu pana ajjhetuñātūsuti pāṭho dissati, etthāyamadhippāyo ‘‘katthaci pasiddhivisayo
anya-e0806n4:48_6: hoti tasaddo, tathā ca vuttaṁ subodhālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṁ pakkantavisayo tathā pasiddhavisayo
anya-e0806n4:48_7: anubhūtavisayo ca taṁsaddo yaṁ saddaṁ nā pekkhate’ti, tasmā pasiddhivisayena tasaddena
anya-e0806n4:48_8: puthageva pasiddhiyā upasaṅgahatthaṁ dvitaggahaṇaṁ kattabba’’nti. Atthattaye vattamānassa
anya-e0806n4:48_9: tu tasaddassa savisayo viseso tatovātthikehi veditabbo.
anya-e0806n4:50_0: Visayasaddo gāmasamudāyepi vattate, gāmasamudāyo ca nāma desoyeva, tenāha visayopi
anya-e0806n4:50_1: gāmasamudāyattā desoyevā’ti, iminā visayadesasaddānaṁ samānādhikaraṇattamāha. Vasāti
anya-e0806n4:52_0: Tannāmeccādinā na kevalaṁ nivāseyeva, athakho vakkhamānesu pīti dasseti. Paccayantaṁ
anya-e0806n4:52_1: sebbādi. Desanāmambhavati catūsu atthesūti viññāyati, tenāha-‘nivāsādo vidhī’ti.
anya-e0806n4:52_2: Nivāsādoti nivāsa adūrabhavanibbattaatthiatthesu. Saṁhitanāmaṁ nāma lokiyasaddavo
anya-e0806n4:58_0: Paccayantanāmeti paccayantanāmaṁ yassa sattamyatthabhūtassa desassa hasminti attho,
anya-e0806n4:58_1: nāññasseti bhūmādivisiṭṭhatthayuttato aññassa paccayantanāmaṁ na hotīti attho. Badarā
anya-e0806n4:64: Majjhe bhavo majjhimo, ante bhavo antimo iccādi.
anya-e0806n4:66_0: Magadhesu araññe gaṅgāyaṁ pabbate vane kule bārāṇasiyaṁ campāyaṁ mithilāyaṁ sambhavoti
anya-e0806n4:66_1: viggaho. ‘‘Dissantaññepi paccayā’’ti (4-120) eyyakoti seso. Paccayantaradassane sati
anya-e0806n4:66_2: imināva suttena ito aññatrāpi paccayantarāni hontīti seso, gāme bhavo udare bhavo
anya-e0806n4:70_1: vādanādikassa abhyāso, so pubbo yassāti samāso, vīṇādisaddehi kimuccateccāha- ‘vīṇādi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n4:70_2: dabbaṁ taṁtaṁsamudāyarūpaṁ. Sippañcāti vatvā tadatthaṁ vibhāveti ‘kiriyā viseso’ti.
anya-e0806n4:70_3: Vādanādikiriyāya visiṭṭho jānanakiriyāvisesoti attho, iminā vīṇādisaddā dabbatthavuttino
anya-e0806n4:70_4: vādanādikiriyaṁ kiriyā visesañca sippamupacārena vadantīti dīpeti. Itisaddo hetumhi.
anya-e0806n4:70_5: Sāyeveti abhyāsitabbā jānanakiriyāvisesassa pubbabhūtā vādanakiriyā, visesetuṁ yuttā
anya-e0806n4:71_0: Yuttatā cettha… vīṇādivādanavasena sippassa gahetabbabhāvato, kathaṁ vīṇādisaddehi
anya-e0806n4:71_1: dabbavuttīti vādanā vuccatīti āha- ‘vīṇādi visayattā’ti, vādanavuttivīṇādisaddānaṁ
anya-e0806n4:71_3: yatheti sambandho. Vuttameva phuṭayanto vuttiganthassa mukhaṁ vivarīyati ‘kiriye’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n4:71_4: Kiriyātyāsapubbakaṁ ñāṇakkhamaṁ kosallaṁ vādanakiriyā visayattā vīṇāvādanamiccanena
anya-e0806n4:71_5: kiriyāsaddena vuccatītyattho. Mudaṅgaṁ mudaṅgavādanaṁ sippamassa, vaṁso sippamassāti
anya-e0806n4:72_0: Appicchatāyāti paccayappicchatāya. Santuṭṭhitāyāti catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhasantuṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0806n4:72_1: Anuvidhīyamānaṁ karīyamānaṁ. Phalanirapekkhanti iminā idha loke cīvarādihetu paṇidhāya
anya-e0806n4:72_2: paṁsukūla dhāraṇādiṁ paṭikkhipati, sīlaṁ tapparabhāvena sevanā. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti
anya-e0806n4:72_4: sīlaṁ paṁsukūladhāraṇavisayanti paṁsukūlādi saddenopacārenoccatī’’ti. Ticīvaraṁ sīlamassāti
anya-e0806n4:72_5: viggaho tesaṁ guḷo paṇyamassāti viggaho tomaraṁ, muggaro paharaṇamassāti viggaho,
anya-e0806n4:72_6: upadhīyatyupariādhīyatīti rathaṅgaṁ vuccati. Kāmakkhandhakilesābhisaṅkhārā vā upadhi
anya-e0806n4:74: Bahumhi bhūtānagatesupi paccayabhāve kāraṇamāha-‘saṅkhyākālānamavivacchitattā’ti, sutte vuttāya ekasaṅkhyāya vuttamānakā lasseva ca vattumanicchitattāti attho.
anya-e0806n4:75_0: Tadupādānantūti tesamekavacanādīnamupādānantu. Taṁ nānantarīya kattāti upalakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0806n4:75_2: kathaṁ ṇādīnaṁ tadatthe jāyamānānaṁ sādhanappadhānatta miccatra hetumāha ‘sabhāvato’ti.
anya-e0806n4:75_3: Mīne hantīti meniko. Ajivhā animisā ca macchā, diṭṭhova sandiṭṭhanti iminā saṁsaddassa
anya-e0806n4:75_4: visuṁ atthabhāvaṁ dasseti. Lokuttaradhammoti navavidho lokuttaradhammo, phaladhammopi
anya-e0806n4:75_6: pariyāyato dissamānova vaṭṭabhayaṁ nivatteti, bhāvanābhisamayavasena maggadhammo
anya-e0806n4:76_0: Vaṭṭabhayanti kammakilesavipākasaṅkhātaṁ tividhavaṭṭabhayaṁ. Vidhāna vacananti appatte-tthe
anya-e0806n4:76_1: niyogasaṅkhātavidhino pakāsataṁ ehipassa vacanaṁ. Parisuddhattāti kilesamalavirahena
anya-e0806n4:76_2: sabbathā visuddhattā. Amanuññampi kadāci sappayojanaṁ yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṁ
anya-e0806n4:76_3: bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṁ dasseti. Tenāha ‘vijjamānampi ce’ccādi. Nanu ca ehipassāti
anya-e0806n4:76_4: tyādyantā, tasmā neteti paccayo pappoti, tathāhi pāṭipadikato paccayavidhānampaṭipāditaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:76_5: na tyādyantato nāpi vākyato, tasmā kathamehipassikoti hotīti āha-‘ehipassasaddocāya’miccādi.
anya-e0806n4:76_6: Padasamudāyassānukaraṇoti padasamūhassa anukaraṇabhūto eko ehipassasaddo. Athavā
anya-e0806n4:76_7: ehi āgaccha imaṁ dhammaṁ passāti yo appatte-tthe niyogasaṅkhāto vidhi, tabbācako
anya-e0806n4:76_8: yannipāto ehipassāti, ehipassavidhiṁ arahatīti ehipassiko, athavā ehicceva nipāto,
anya-e0806n4:76_9: dassanaṁ ñāpanaṁ passo, ehīti passo ñāpanaṁ ehipasso, ehipassaṁ arahatīti ehipassiko.
anya-e0806n4:78_0: Ekībhāvoti muggehi saṁsaṭṭhānaṁ māsānamiva missībhāvo. Esoti saṁsaggo, ukkaṁsenāti
anya-e0806n4:78_1: ukkaṁsādhānena utkaṁsasādhanena (potthake) ca bhavitabbanti sambandho . Saṁsaggaukkaṁsānaṁ
anya-e0806n4:78_3: yattha saṁsaggarahitaṁ kevalamabhisaṅkhattamatthi, tattha paccayamudāharaṇena dassetvā
anya-e0806n4:78_4: vijjāya saha saṁsaggassāvijjamānatte kāraṇaṁ vadati ‘rūpī dhammattā’tiādi. Rūpaṁ
anya-e0806n4:78_5: bhūtopādāyabhedamassa atthīti rūpī, ghatādi saṁsaṭṭhaṁ bhattādi. Tassa dhammo sabhāvo
anya-e0806n4:78_6: saṁsaggo, tassa bhāvo tattaṁ, tasmā, tassāti saṁsaggassa, vijjātvarūpī… yathāvutta
anya-e0806n4:78_7: rūpasabhāvābhāvā, tenāha- ‘vijjāya ca arūpittā’ti caraiccandhātuyeva carati.
anya-e0806n4:79_0: Vācasikaṁ mānasikanti ‘‘manādīnaṁ saka, yaṁkiñcīti satādikaṁ yaṁkiñci. Bāhulakenevetthāvadhāraṇaṁ
anya-e0806n4:79_1: labbhatīti vuttaṁ- ‘tato vā’ti, devadattena kītoti so attho tadattho, tassa appatīti
anya-e0806n4:79_2: abhidhānasattivekallena vuttiyamanavagamo, devadattikoti hi vutte devadattena kītotyayamattho
anya-e0806n4:79_3: nappatīyate… tādisa saddasattivekallena tadatthassānamidhīyamānattā, avagamo ca nāma
anya-e0806n4:79_4: sati sāmatthiye siyāti imamatthaṁ saṅkhepato dassetumāha- ‘tadatthāppatītiyā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:80_0: Abhidhānalakkhaṇattanti abhidhānaṁ sati sāmatthiye vākye vacanīyassātthassa vuttiyā
anya-e0806n4:80_1: kathanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ sabhāvo yesante abhidhānalakkhaṇā, tesaṁ bhāvo tattaṁ, tabbādisamāpyevameva
anya-e0806n4:80_2: daṭṭhabbā. Maricena abhisaṅkhataṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ vāti, salākāya jitanti viggaho.
anya-e0806n4:84: Pavuttepīti kaccāyanena pavuttanti atthe ‘‘aññasmiṁ’’tismiṁṇo hotevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n4:88: Mātāpitunnaṁ mātāpitaroti mātuyā mātāpitaro pitussa mātāpitaro, na ekamekato dvīsūti ekato ekato vuttanayena dvīsudvīsu atthesu na bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n4:92_0: Sena rūpena ñātepi visesarūpena aññāto aññātaviseso. Kaṭṭhādimayā yā paṭimā tampaṭicchandakaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:92_1: Sambandho sassāmīlakkhaṇo assa atthīti sambandhi kassāti kiṁ saddaniddiṭṭho, sova
anya-e0806n4:92_2: viseso, sambandhiviseso visayo assa aññāṇassāti samāso. Payogāsambhavāti ayamassoti
anya-e0806n4:92_3: vutta assappakatiyāpi payogā sambhavā. Tathāhi yadi yassāccantamajānanaṁ siyā tathā
anya-e0806n4:92_4: sati sabbathā vatthujānanābhāve pakatiyeva na siyā, na hi sabbathā aviññātattho saddo
anya-e0806n4:92_5: payogamaharati, tasmā sarūpena ñātassa yassa viseso aviññāto, soyevidha aññāto-timatoti
anya-e0806n4:92_6: viññāyate, aññāto-ssokassa aññāto sesaññassa (potthake) vā kutotivā kiṁ sabhāvo veti
anya-e0806n4:92_7: hi assakoti. Kappaccayanto hatthikaiccayannāmadheyyaṁ nāmaṁ yassa hatthiviyāti dassitapaṭibhāgassa
anya-e0806n4:92_8: so kappaccayantanāmadheyyo. Abhinivesena vā sijjhanti yathā ajjunādivesadhārini ajjunādisaddenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n4:93_0: Paṭimāyāti ettha pūjanatthā eva paṭimā gahitā, morasamāna nāmattā moroviyāti yojanā,
anya-e0806n4:93_1: cañcā tiṇapuriso, idha pana taṁ sadiso puriso manusso cañcā. Akasmā eva ākasmikaṁ
anya-e0806n4:93_2: ‘‘sakatthe’’ti (4-122) ṇiko. Yaṁkiñci abuddhipubbakaṁ, tamākasmikaṁ, tasmiṁ ākasmikebhidheyyo
anya-e0806n4:93_3: sati ivasaddatthe vattamānato īyo hotīti attho. Kāko ca tālañca phalaṁ kākatālāni,
anya-e0806n4:93_4: tesamiva milanaṁ. Ajākhaggānamiva milanaṁ yadākasmikaṁ, kiñci tama jākhaggīyaṁ ,
anya-e0806n4:93_5: ṇo ivatthe. Sakkaranti ‘‘saṁyoge kvacī’’ti (4-125) vuddhyabhāvo. Munīva, bālova,
anya-e0806n4:93_6: kulisamiva, ekasālāivāti viggaho, lohitova lohitiko phaṭikamaṇi.
anya-e0806n4:95_0: Doṇādītyādisaddena khārasatādayopi parimāṇavisesā gayhanti. Saṅkhyā asītipañcādayo,
anya-e0806n4:95_1: aññaṁ vā yaṁkiñcīti upaḍḍhakāyādi, soḷasa doṇā ekā khārī. Nanu pañcakaṁ ganthajātanti
anya-e0806n4:95_2: vatvā aññaṁ vā saṅghādikanti vuttaṁ taṁ kathaṁ pāṇiniyehi viya ‘‘saṅkhyāya saññāsaṅghasuttājjhayanesū’’ti
anya-e0806n4:95_4: saṅkhyeye vattantī’’ti pañcasaddassa saṅkhyeye vuttattā āha- ‘pañcāvayavā’ti. Parimāṇasaddasannidhāne
anya-e0806n4:95_5: saṅkhyānepi pañcasaddoti maññamāno āha- ‘pañcasaṅkhyānañce’ti. Pañcā vuttayoti pañcavārā,
anya-e0806n4:95_6: rūpānīti ca pariyāyantarena āvuttisaddasse vātthaṁ byattaṁ karoti.
anya-e0806n4:97_0: Nanu sutte saṅkhyāyanti na vuttaṁ katyādayo ca payogā saṅkhyā parimāṇeyeva dissanti
anya-e0806n4:97_1: kathaṁ nāmetthāyaṁ vidhīti āha- ‘bahule’ccādi. Saṅkhyāparimāṇeyevāyaṁ vidhīti kiṁ
anya-e0806n4:97_2: sadde saṅkhyāparimāṇa visayeyeva vattamāne ayaṁ ratyādiko vidhīti attho, nanu cettha
anya-e0806n4:97_3: kiṁ saddo pañhe vattamāno kathaṁ saṅkhyāparimāṇe vattateti vuccate, yajjapi saṅkhyāparimāṇe
anya-e0806n4:97_4: na vattate, tathāpi saṅkhyāparimāṇassa pucchiyamānattā saṅkhyāparimāṇavisaye vattate
anya-e0806n4:97_6: parimāṇakattena. Ayametthādhippāyo ‘‘yadākimidaṁ saṅkhyā parimāṇamesaṁ dasannaṁ na
anya-e0806n4:97_7: kiñci appakamevetanti saṅkhyāparimāṇameva kiṁ saddena nindīyate, tadāpi saṅkhyā parimāṇassa
anya-e0806n4:97_8: nindīyamānattā saṅkhyāparimāṇavisayattameveti khepe vattamānāpi kiṁ saddā raticcādi
anya-e0806n4:97_9: siyā, bahulādhikārāditova panettha na siyā’’ti. Rakārānubandhā isaddalopatthāti yojanā.
anya-e0806n4:99_1: cā’’ti (5-59) kattari kte ñimhi ca bubhukkhito pipāsitoti siddhepi vattamāne payogatthaṁ
anya-e0806n4:101: Sabbamparicchedarūpanti ummānaparimāṇādikaṁ sabbaṁ paricchedarūpaṁ. Tatra ca uccattena mānamummānaṁ, sabbato mānaṁ parimāṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:103_1: tattha pamāṇa māyāmo. Saṅkhyāyāti pañcamī. Etehi saṁsaye matto vattabboti attho.
anya-e0806n4:104_0: Na vattabbanti yathāvuttavattabbavacanaṁ paṭikkhipati. Paṭikkhitte tasmiṁ vidatthimattaṁ
anya-e0806n4:104_1: ratanamattaṁ vātiādi(nā) yaṁkiñci daṇḍapubbaṇṇādikaṁ paṇṇādikaṁ (potthake) saṁsayitaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:104_2: tena mānasaṅkhātassa paricchedassābhāvā kathamete payogā siyunti āsaṅkiya tattha
anya-e0806n4:104_4: ratanammāna massātyādinā tenappakārena abhyūhanato abhyupagamatoti attho. Saṁsayo
anya-e0806n4:104_5: ca nāma ubhayapakkhaparāmasane sati siyāti yathāvuttamabbhūhanaṁ sādhetumāha-nāntarene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:104_6: Pakkhadvayehīti vidatthi mānamassa ratanammānamassāti evamādikehi pakkhadvayehi.
anya-e0806n4:104_7: Abhyūhanaṁ saṁsayassāti gamyate. Jaṇṇu mānamassa jaṇṇutagghaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:110_0: Saccutīsāsadasantāya saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asmiṁ satasahasse adhikā saṅkhyāti atthe
anya-e0806n4:110_1: ḍo bhavatīti suttattho. Saccutīsā sadasantāti paṭhamāvacanaṁ paṭhamantato vidhiñāpanatthaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:110_2: Nanu ca sutte ‘satasahassa satasahasse ḍo’ti na vuttaṁ, tathā sati vuttiyaṁ kathaṁ
anya-e0806n4:110_4: sataṁ sahassanti ca satasahassanti ca ubhayappakārenāvagamā, ubhayathāvagamo payoga
anya-e0806n4:110_5: dassanañcettha evaṁ vivaraṇe kāraṇanti adhippāyo. Paccayatthena samānajātiye pakatyatthe
anya-e0806n4:110_6: satīti yenakenaci suvaṇṇakahāpaṇādinā paccayatthena samānajātiye. Suvaṇṇamāsakadīna
anya-e0806n4:110_7: suvaṇṇakahāpaṇādīnaṁ (potthake) masamāna jātiyānaṁ. Akevalaṁ codāharaṇaṁ dassetuṁ
anya-e0806n4:112_0: Nanu ca saṅkhyāsaddo saṅkhyāne saṅkhyeyye ca vattate, kathamettha saṅkhyānevasitā
anya-e0806n4:112_1: vutti yenevaṁ vivaraṇaṁ katamiccāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi, paccāsannaṁ saṅkhyāsaddassāti
anya-e0806n4:112_2: adhippāyo. Iminā ca karaṇasādhano-yaṁ pūraṇasaddoti viññāpeti. Yatoti vuttayaṁ saddasambandhinā
anya-e0806n4:112_3: taṁsaddena seti ulliṅgitassa saṅkhyātiatthamupadassiya sāyeva pūrīyatetīmassa kammabhāvena
anya-e0806n4:112_4: tiṭṭhatīti dassetuṁ tena pūraṇena pūrīyate’ti āha.
anya-e0806n4:113_1: dabbānaṁ dabbantare nātirittīkaraṇaṁ saṅkhyāya pūraṇaṁ kiñcarahi tassa samappattiyevā’’ti.
anya-e0806n4:113_2: Atha kāyaṁ vacoyutti ‘sāsaṅkhyā pūrīyate yene’ti, yāvatā sāti yasmā paccayo vihito
anya-e0806n4:113_3: tassa saṅkhyāsaddassa parāmāso tassa ca pūraṇena abhedoccāsaṅkiyāha- ‘abhedenoccate
anya-e0806n4:113_4: saṅkhyā pūrīyate yenetī’ti abhidhānābhidheyyānamabhedopacārena vuccatītyattho, saṅkhyeyyapūraṇe
anya-e0806n4:113_5: ḍo na hotīti vatvā tadatthaṁ vibhāvetumāha- ‘dvādasanna’miccādi. So ghaṭo tāsaṁ ghaṭikānaṁ
anya-e0806n4:113_6: pūraṇo dabbānaṁ dabbantare nāti rittīkaraṇavasena. Vīsatiyā pūraṇotiādinā viggaho.
anya-e0806n4:115_0: Kaccāyanena ‘‘dvitīhi tiyo’’ti (2-8-42) suttena dvitisaddehi tiyappaccayaṁ vidhāya
anya-e0806n4:115_1: ‘‘tiye dutāpi cā’’ti (2-8-43) dvitīnaṁ dutādesena dutiyaṁ tatiyanti ca ‘‘catuchehi
anya-e0806n4:115_2: thaṭhā’’ti (2-8-41) suttena catuto thappaccayaṁ vidhāya dvittena catutthanti ca nipphāditaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:115_3: Idha tathā bhāvena kathaṁ te sijjhantīti āsaṅkiya vuttiyaṁ ‘katha’miccādi vuttanti
anya-e0806n4:117_0: Saṅkhyāvacanassa gahaṇe ko dosoccāha-‘saṅkhyāvāci’ccādi. Bahuttavisaye payogo na
anya-e0806n4:117_1: siyāti saṅkhyāvacanassa ekatthe niyatattā vuttaṁ. Ekākīhiccassa atthamācikkhati padhānabhūteheva’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n4:119_0: Taro hotīti vuttepi tehi taro hotīti viññāyati, vacchādīhīti sutattā pana vacchādīnanti
anya-e0806n4:119_1: ca viññāyatīti vacchādīnantiādinā vuttiganthopadassanaṁ. Nanu tanutte vavacchādīhi
anya-e0806n4:119_2: paccayo vidhīyate, ye ca sarīrena kisāvacchādayo, tatrāpyavisesena payogo pasajjati
anya-e0806n4:119_3: payopasajjane (potthake) visesānupādānato, tasmā kathamatra sabhāvasseva tanuttaṁ
anya-e0806n4:119_4: viññāyate yenevaṁ vivaṭamiccāha- ‘vacchādisaddāna’ micca-di, vacchādīhi pakatīti
anya-e0806n4:119_5: paccaye vidhīyamāne tāsaṁ pavattinimittaṁ vayovisesādi, yasmiṁ sati vacchādayo saddā
anya-e0806n4:119_6: dabbe-bhinivisante, taṁ paccayā-sannaṁ, na ca kisattassa bhāvā dabbe vacchādisaddā
anya-e0806n4:119_7: pavattante. Ato tasseva saddappavattinimittassa tanutte yuttaṁ paccayena bhavituṁ,
anya-e0806n4:119_8: (na) tanuttamatteti maññate. Pavattinimittaṁ sambandhi āsannanti samānādhikaraṇāni.
anya-e0806n4:120_0: Vaccho paṭhamavayo, tassa tanuttaṁ dutiyavayappatti. Dutiyañhi vayaṁ pappontassa
anya-e0806n4:120_1: vacchassa paṭhamo vayo vacchasaddassa pavattinimittaṁ kiñcimattāvasesaṁ bhavati amumevāha-‘susuttasse’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n4:120_2: Ukkhotaruṇodutiyavayappatto vuccate, tassa tanuttaṁ tatiyavayappatti. Tatiyañhi vayappattakāle
anya-e0806n4:120_3: dutiyassa vayassa ukkhasaddappavatti nimittassa kiñcimattā vasesato vasissate (potthake)
anya-e0806n4:120_4: jātisaṅkarattā gaddabhajātiyā vaḷavājātiyā ca missattā. Bhāravāhakattampati yo samattho,
anya-e0806n4:120_5: so usabhotyuccate, yadātu tassa bhāravāhakatte sāmatthiyaṁ mandaṁ bhavati parikkhīṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:122_0: Samudāyo nāma dvyavayavo vā siyā bahukāvayavo vā, tattha dvyavayavasamudāyā niddhāraṇe
anya-e0806n4:122_1: sāmatthiyā ekasseva niddhāraṇaṁ viññāyati tamevānusarati. Bahukāvayavasamudāyāpye
anya-e0806n4:122_2: ‘kassa niddhāraṇe’ti sutte ekassāti vacanābhāvepi ekasseva niddhāraṇaṁ viññātabbaṁ
anya-e0806n4:122_3: teneva kataro bhavataṁ devadatto’tyādikamudāharaṇamadāsi. Kataro bhavataṁ devadatto
anya-e0806n4:122_5: bahuttena vuttaṁ. Apaccaparaṁparāya pavattaṁ gottaṁ vaṁso, tadabhi dhāyino apaccappaccayantāpi
anya-e0806n4:122_6: abhedopacārena gottaṁ, tevāpaccā paccavantasambandhadvārenāpacce pavattāti sambandhisaddā
anya-e0806n4:122_7: bhavanti, caraṇasaddā ca kaṭhā yo kiriyāsaddā bhavanti kaṭhādīhi vuttajjhayanatthaṁ
anya-e0806n4:122_9: kesañci atthassa kiriyāsaddānaṁ cātthassa asatyapi jātitte jātinibandhanaṁ loke kāriyamiṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0806n4:122_10: taduttaṁ ‘‘gottañca cara- ṇehi sahā’’ti. Tatthāpi jātittamparibhāsitaṁ, tenāha- ‘kaṭhassa
anya-e0806n4:124_0: Lokiyāti parasaddasatthakāre sandhāyāha. Iha tu avisesena vuttanti sambandho. Niruttiyaṁ
anya-e0806n4:124_1: sāmaññena vuttattāti yojanā. Sāmaññena vuttākāraṁ dassetuṁ ‘katha’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:124_2: Devehi datto brahmunā dattotiādīni kattari karaṇe vā viggahavākyāni. Devadatto devadattiko
anya-e0806n4:125_1: devalo deviyotiādīnampana vacanantareneva nipphattiṁ dassetuṁ ‘devehi datto’tiādi
anya-e0806n4:125_2: vuttaṁ. Parasaddasatthakārānampi devalo deviyoti vacanantareneva sādhanaṁ sādhanākārañca
anya-e0806n4:125_3: tesaṁ dassetuṁ ‘kecīhī’tiādi vuttaṁ. Ekadesatoyeva paccayamicchanti tena tesaṁ devalo
anya-e0806n4:125_4: deviyo datti loccādi bhavati. Kappanāgāravoti dattasaddalopanāmekadesavasena kappanāgāravo.
anya-e0806n4:127_0: Na ca sabbetiādinā bahulādhikāre phalaṁ vuttaṁ. Bhāvasaddo katthaci kiriyāyaṁ vattate
anya-e0806n4:127_1: ‘bhāve ayaṁ vidhī’ti. Katthaci adhippāye ‘ayametesaṁ bhāvo bhāvodhippāyo’ti. Katthaci
anya-e0806n4:127_2: padatthe ‘ime bhāvā’ti. Katthaci sattāmatte‘tiṇānaṁ bhāvo’ti. Tenāha-‘bhāvasaddasse’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:127_3: Rūpasādhana dvārenāti bhāvasaddassa rūpasādhanadvārena, sappanti pakāsenti attha
anya-e0806n4:127_4: manenāti saddo. Sova abhidhānaṁ abhidhīyate-nenatthoti katvā. Bujjhati atthasarūpanti
anya-e0806n4:127_5: buddhi, sāva patīyate-nenāttho pacceti attha miti vā paccayoti vuccati.
anya-e0806n4:128_0: Nanu ca ‘bhavanti etasmā buddhisaddā’ti vuttaṁ tasmā pavattinimittamubhinnampi bhavati,
anya-e0806n4:128_1: tathāsati ‘saddappavattinimitta’nti saddasseva pavattinimittatā kasmā vuttāti vuccate.
anya-e0806n4:128_2: Pākaṭabhāvena abhidhānābhidheyyasambandhassa saddasseva pavattinimittataṁ vatvā visuṁ
anya-e0806n4:128_3: buddhiyā nimittassa rūpānugatattaṁ visesetvā pavattinimittatamassā dīpetuṁ ‘nimittavasāhi’ccādimāha.
anya-e0806n4:128_4: Dabbeguṇoti dabbe vuttiyaṁ guṇo nimittanti sambandho. Guṇasaddasseva jātisaddattenodāharaṇadvayaṁ
anya-e0806n4:128_5: dattaṁ… guṇassa jātiyā visuṁ jātinimittassābhāvato nidhittassa bhāvato. Kiriyādītiādisaddena
anya-e0806n4:128_6: dabbādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ, keci pana kiriyāsaddānaṁ kiriyā pavattinimittantyāhu. Tesaṁ devadattādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n4:128_7: avatthāvisesena avatthābhedena sāmaññaṁ tadavatthā visesasāmaññaṁ. Tenāha- ‘devadattassā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:128_8: Vijjamāno padattho visayo yesaṁ devadattādīnaṁ saññāsaddānaṁ tesaṁ pavattinimittaṁ
anya-e0806n4:129_0: Anena ca devadattādayo saññāsaddāpi samānā jātisaddāti vuttaṁ hoti. Yadi carahi saññāsaddāpi
anya-e0806n4:129_1: jātivacanā siyuṁ, pañcavidhattamesaṁ parihāyatīti. Nedamevaṁ viññeyyaṁ… pasiddhatarajātyābhidhāna
anya-e0806n4:130_1: sambandhīnaṁ bhedena abhāvassa bhedato abhedepi bhedā upacaritā santīti yojanā. Yassa
anya-e0806n4:130_3: ākāso viya niravayavā abhāvo viya asantā ca, te visayo yesaṁ saddānaṁ tesanti attho.
anya-e0806n4:130_4: Sāmaññaṁ bhāvoti puthujjanādisāmaññaṁ bhāvoti attho. Alasassa bhāvo kiriyāsambandhittaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:130_5: brahmaññaṁ jāti cāpalyaṁ nepuññaṁ guṇo vā. Vuttiyaṁ sakatthekantāti ‘‘sakatthe’’ti
anya-e0806n4:130_6: (4-122) iminā sakatthe katakappaccayantāti attho. Na daṭṭhabbanti sambandho. Pattakālova
anya-e0806n4:132: ‘‘Ekayoganiddiṭṭhānaṁ sahavāpavatti sahavā nivattī’’ti ‘bhāva kammesū’ti anuvattate. Tathāpi bhāvetīmināvettha sappayojanattaṁ dassetumāha- ‘bhāvakammesu’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:134_0: Yajjapi sīdhātussa kevalassa supane pavatti, tathāpyatipubbassa ukkaṁse pavattīti
anya-e0806n4:134_1: āha- ‘atisayo ukkaṁso’ti. So ca atisayo kassa sambhavaticcāha- ‘so ca kiriyāguṇāna’nti.
anya-e0806n4:134_3: Anapekkhito kiriyāguṇānaṁ nissayo dabbasaṅkhāto yesanti viggaho, dabbassa nissayabhūtassā-tisayattaṁ
anya-e0806n4:134_4: hontampi nissitānaṁ kiriyā guṇānaṁ vaseneva siyā nāññathāti vattumāha-‘paccadhikaraṇa’ntiādi.
anya-e0806n4:135_0: Nanu ca yadi kiriyāguṇānamevātisayo, tadā na sijjhati ‘gotaro’ti nesa doso, no cettha
anya-e0806n4:135_1: jātiyātisayo, kassa carahi guṇassa go ayaṁ yo sakaṭaṁ vahati, gotaro-yaṁ yo sakaṭaṁ
anya-e0806n4:135_2: vahati sirañcāti, jātiyā hi niccāyekarūpāya nokkaṁsāpakaṁsayogo sambhavatīti dabbassāpi
anya-e0806n4:135_3: nātisayasambhavo. Tathāhi tulyappamāṇassa guṇakatova mūlato ukkaṁso dissati samānepi
anya-e0806n4:135_4: hi āyāme vitthāre ca paṭassa kāsikassāññovāggho bhavati māthurassāñño vāti. Dabbassāpi
anya-e0806n4:135_7: vattati nāma, tadagge tabbācikāpi pakati attano vacanīyatthavasena tattha vattatiyeva
anya-e0806n4:135_8: nāmāti ‘atiyaye vattamānato’ti pakativisesanavasena vuttaṁ, tenevāha- ‘iminā pakati
anya-e0806n4:135_9: visesanattañcāhā’ti. Sakatthikānaṁ pakatiattho jotanīyo hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:136_0: Sakatthikānanti kattari chaṭṭhī sambandhavacanicchāya, sakatthikehīti attho. Hetumāha-
anya-e0806n4:136_2: tato pakatyatthabhūte-tisaye jātattā sakatthikehi yathāvuttanayena pakatyatthabhūtetisayo
anya-e0806n4:136_3: jotanīyo hotīti attho. Tattha nābhidheyyoti byatirekamāha, tathā ca vakkhati- ‘atisayajotakātarādayo’ti.
anya-e0806n4:137_0: Atha pakativisesanatte kasmā nābhidheyyo jotanīyoccāha ‘pakatiyāyeva’ccādi. Ukkaṁso
anya-e0806n4:137_1: samānaguṇavisayeyeva loke diṭṭho paviṭṭho (potthake) tena sāmaññavacanepi tādithavisayeyeva
anya-e0806n4:137_2: soyeva kāraṇa vasena hotīti dassetumāha- ‘atisayene’ccādi. Dvinnamekassā-tisayeccādinā
anya-e0806n4:137_4: Taraiyāti sakavohārena vuttaṁ, tesantu īyappaccayo. Evamihāvidhānaṁ sukhasānettanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:138_1: pāṭaliputtakehi sukumāratarā’ccādo tarappaccayo na hotīti eko māthuro dutiyo pāṭaliputtako
anya-e0806n4:138_2: imesaṁ sukumārānaṁ dvinnameko māthuro-tisayena sukumāro sukumārataro, ekamaññesaṁ
anya-e0806n4:138_3: dvinnamukkaṁsetathāññesaṁ dvinnamekassāti evaṁ dvinnaṁdvinnamekekassa ukkaṁse tarappaccayo
anya-e0806n4:138_5: samudāyānamavayavā māthurā bahavo pāṭaliputtakāpi nikkaṁsiyamānā tathevāvayavā bahavo
anya-e0806n4:138_6: honti, evaṁ māthurā pāṭali puttakehi sukumāratarā’ti tarappaccayena sijjhati. Imasmiṁ
anya-e0806n4:138_7: gāme aḍḍhatarā vāṇijjāccādopi kathitena ñāyena dvinnaṁdvinnamekekassa ukkaṁse tarappaccayo
anya-e0806n4:138_8: bhavati, bahuvacanantu katthaci avayavāpekkhanti sabbaṁ sakkate kicchena sādhenti.
anya-e0806n4:138_9: Iha tu tathāvidhassa suttassā vidhānā ‘‘taratamissikiyiṭṭhātisaye’’ti tarādīnamatisaye
anya-e0806n4:138_10: sāmaññena vidhānā sabbattha tarappaccayena sukhasādhanaṁ hotī’’ti.
anya-e0806n4:139_0: Avatthābhedenāti paṭutarāvatthāvato paṭuavatthāya bhinnattā vuttaṁ, tathāhi tamevāvatthantarayuttaṁ
anya-e0806n4:139_1: vattāro bhavanti aññe ‘bhavaṁsūavattho’ti. Pakārantarenapi sādhane hetumāha- ‘atisayamatte
anya-e0806n4:139_3: yathāvuttānaṁ tarādīnaṁ pañcannaṁ majjhe, rūpāni guṇavacanassa vuttiyamudāharitāni.
anya-e0806n4:139_4: Kiriyāvacanassa tu ‘atisayena pācakataro pācakatamo’ti. Issika iyaiṭṭhā sarādī tato
anya-e0806n4:141_0: Tassāti sāmaññena vuttepi vikārasambandhīyeva chaṭṭhiyanto gayhati, chaṭṭhiyantasambandhīyeva
anya-e0806n4:141_1: ca vikāro gayhati sambandhavasāti dassetumāha ‘yassā’ccādi. Kosakārakapāṇavisesehi
anya-e0806n4:141_2: kato koso. Pāṇayo sattā, osadhyophalapākantā, rukkhā pupphaphalūpagāti rukkhosadhīnaṁ
anya-e0806n4:141_3: lakkhaṇaṁ vadanti tallakkhaṇenettha rukkho sadhayo na gayhanti, kiñcarahi osadhisaddena
anya-e0806n4:141_4: latādipi gayhati, rukkhasaddena (vanappa)tayopi, vanappatayo hi phalavantā na pupphavantā.
anya-e0806n4:141_5: Kathaṁ gāvassa vikāre purise mayoccāha- ‘aññasmi’ntiādi. Gāvassa idaṁ gomayaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:145_0: Tīsuttaresu ca vattateti sambandho. Rājaññamanussānampi jātiyamapacce ññassappaccayānaṁ
anya-e0806n4:145_1: vidhānā vuttaṁ ‘gottappaccayantā’ti āha- ‘rājaññānaṁ samūho’ccādi. Ukkho usabho.
anya-e0806n4:145_2: Oṭṭho kharato, urabbho meso, evamiccādinā ‘ukkhānaṁ samūho’ccādi. Vākyamapadisati.
anya-e0806n4:145_3: Kākānaṁ samūhoti viggaho, ṇikaacittāti iminā ṇiko acittavāca keheva dissatīti ñāpeti.
anya-e0806n4:147_1: atthe chaṭṭhiyantato īyappaccayo hotī’ti. Tena madanassa ṭhānaṁ madanīyaṁ bandhanassa
anya-e0806n4:147_2: ṭhānaṁ bandhanīyaṁtyādikaṁ sādhenti. Idha pana tathāvidhassābhāvā kathaṁ taṁ sijjhatītyāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n4:148_1: āyitattappaccayo hotī’’ti tena dhūmo viya dissatīti dhūmāyitattaṁ timiramiva dissatīti
anya-e0806n4:148_2: timirāyitattaṁtyādikaṁ sādhentīti vuttanayameva. Tampihaccādikaṁ dvīsu sādhanakkamadassanaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:148_3: dhūmo viya dissatīti dassito yo kammattho sopi dhūmāyīti kattuvasena sakkā parikappetunti
anya-e0806n4:148_4: kattusādhanato dhūmāyitasaddā sakatthettappaccayepi dhūmo viya dissatīti atthe āyitatthappaccayepi
anya-e0806n4:148_5: nātthabhedo-ññatravacanicchābhedāti daṭṭhabbaṁ, bhāvattho pana tesaṁ bhāvappadhānavasena
anya-e0806n4:148_6: labbhati, dhūmasseva dassananti viggahe āyitattena vā.
anya-e0806n4:152: Pavāse dūragamane sādhu pavāsiko, upavāse ratyabhojane sādhu upavāsiko.
anya-e0806n4:154: Pathe sādhu upākārakaṁ pātheyyaṁ, maggopakaraṇaṁ, sapatimhi dhana patimhi sādhu upakaraṇaṁ sāpateyyaṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:156: Tumantakiriyāyāti ghātetuṁ (tyādītu) mantakiriyāya. Vā saddo samuccayo, ghātetuṁ vātiādinā yojetabbo.
anya-e0806n4:158_1: byāpārīyaticcāha-‘ettha assa atthī’ti. Nanu ca yaṁ yassa hoti taṁ tasmimpi hoti (yaṁ
anya-e0806n4:158_2: yasmiṁ hoti) tassāpi taṁ hoti teneva vuccate- ‘chaṭṭhīsattamīnamaviseso’ti, tatrañña
anya-e0806n4:158_3: taraniddeseneva siddhe kimatthamiha chaṭṭhīsattamīnaṁ bhedenopādānaṁ karīyatīti vuccate-yatrāvayavāvayavibhāvo,
anya-e0806n4:159_0: Nanu ca sambhave byabhicāre ca sati visesanaṁ sātthakaṁ bhavati yathā ‘nīlamuppala’nti,
anya-e0806n4:159_1: nevātthittassātthi byabhicāro, tathā ca vuttaṁ- ‘na sattaṁ padattho byabhicaratī’ti,
anya-e0806n4:159_3: abyabhicāre pīti sambandho. Kālantarā byabhicāratthamatthītivisesananti dassetumāha- ‘kāle’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:160_0: Nanu ca suttesu kālo padhānaṁ na hoti, ‘‘tena kataṁ kītaṁ’’tyādinā hi paccayattho
anya-e0806n4:160_1: dassito, tathā hi kāyikaṁvācasikaṁ tyādo na kālasampaccayo, evamihāpi sattāmatte
anya-e0806n4:160_2: bhavitabbaṁ, atthīti tu vattamānasattāya eva pariggaho kathamavasīyate yena kālavisesanaṁ
anya-e0806n4:160_3: siyāti. Saccaṁ, kintu padatthassa sattābyabhicārābhāvepi atthītivisesanopādānasāmatthiyātra
anya-e0806n4:160_4: visiṭṭho sattā atthīti visesanattenopāttā, na sattāmattanti patīyate, sā pana visiṭṭhā
anya-e0806n4:160_5: sattā sampatisattā, atthi ca tassā byabhicāro sāmaññasattāyāti yujjateva visesanavisessabhāvoti
anya-e0806n4:161_0: Na bhuñjaticcādiviyāti yathā na bhuñjatīti nañssa paṭisedhattā viruddhatthapadassa
anya-e0806n4:161_2: bhavati, tamivākyattho. Adhippāyattha māha- ‘atthivacanicchāya yo visayo tassa niyamo’ti.
anya-e0806n4:161_3: Kati payasambhave na pana gomā rukkhavāti yojanā, tehīti pasaṁsāpahūtehi. Kakude
anya-e0806n4:161_4: āvatto kakudāvatto, nindito kakudāvatto assa atthīti kakudāvattī. Kathaṁ ninditattamassiccāha-‘kakudā
anya-e0806n4:161_5: vatto’ccādi. Saṁsatto daṇḍo assa atthiccanena gehaṭṭhitena vijjamānenapi daṇḍena
anya-e0806n4:161_7: dabbe-bhidheyye, bhavaṁ bhaveyyāti yadākadāci bhavanto yadi bhaveyya.
anya-e0806n4:165_0: Dve hontīti iko īceti dve honti, ekamekaṁvāti ubhinnaṁ. Vāsaddo dve hontīti etthāpi
anya-e0806n4:165_1: daṭṭhabbo. Uttamīṇeva dhanā ikoti gaṇasuttaṁ vivarati ‘uttamīṇevā’tiādi. Kenettha
anya-e0806n4:165_2: samāsoti āha- ‘syādisyādinekatthanti samāso’ti. Uttamīṇo dhanasāmī. Asannihite atthāti
anya-e0806n4:165_3: gaṇasuttaṁ, asannihitetīmassa atthaṁ vivarati ‘appatte’ti. Asampatteti attho. Asannihiteti
anya-e0806n4:165_4: ca attho iccassa visesanaṁ. Atthanaṁ asannihite atthe āsisanaṁ attho, so assa atthīti
anya-e0806n4:165_5: atthiko atthī. Tadantācāti gaṇasuttaṁ, asannihitetyanuvattate, asannihitopādhikā
anya-e0806n4:165_6: atthantā ca ika īppaccayo bhavatītyattho. Vaṇṇantāīyevāti gaṇasuttaṁ, brahmānaṁ devānaṁ
anya-e0806n4:165_7: vaṇṇoti vā samāso. Hatthadantehi jātiyanti gaṇasuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:166_0: Jātiyanti paccayavisesanaṁ. Vaṇṇato brahmacārimhīti gaṇasuttaṁ. Brahmasaddena niyamaviseso
anya-e0806n4:166_2: nasuddassāti dassento āha- ‘tañce’ccādi. Tevaṇṇiko vaṇṇīti vuccatīti sambandho. Tīsu
anya-e0806n4:166_3: vaṇṇesu bhavo tadantogadhattā tevaṇṇikoti bhavatthe ṇiko. Vaṇṇasaddo brāhmaṇādivaṇṇavacano.
anya-e0806n4:167_0: Athavā brahmanti nibbānaṁ tadattho ganthopi, taṁ brahmaṁ nibbānaṁ dhammaṁ vā tepiṭakaṁ
anya-e0806n4:167_1: caratīti brahmacārī, yati. Yatayopi hi vaṇṇīti brahmacārinoti vuccanti. Vaṇṇīliṅgīti
anya-e0806n4:167_2: hi vutte tiliṅgavāti attho. Vaṇṇa saddo panettha yathāvutta brahmapariyāyo. Pokkharādito
anya-e0806n4:167_3: deseti gaṇasuttaṁ. Deso cettha yattha(tthi pokkharādīni so). Padumagaccha pokkharaṇīnaṁ
anya-e0806n4:167_4: vācakassāti iminā padumāni assaṁ santīti paduminīti pokkharaṇīpi vuccatīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n4:167_5: Nāvā atthīti nāviko, yāgame nāvāyiko. Sukhadukkhā ī, balā bāhūrupubbā ceti ca gaṇasuttāni.
anya-e0806n4:169_0: Ihāpi pasajjeyya madhu asmiṁ ghaṭe atthīti etthāpi payoge madhuranti rappaccayo pāpuṇeyya
anya-e0806n4:169_1: madhumhi abhidheyyati adhippāyo. Na gacchantīti nagā. Yajjapi ūsavāccādo pahūtādivisayāyātthitāya
anya-e0806n4:169_2: sambhavo, tathāpi ñusādivato paccaya(ttha)ttena vacanicchābhāvā ñusavā ghaṭoccādi
anya-e0806n4:169_3: na sijjhati tasmā pahūtādivisayātthitāsambhavepi taṁvato-tthassa paccaya(ttha)ttena
anya-e0806n4:169_4: ñusaro desoti vattu micchāyaṁ paccayo yathā siyā aññatramābhaviccevamattho veditabboti
anya-e0806n4:171: Parehi vācāsaddā ālo vihito nindāyaṁ, neha tatheti codanamubbhāvayati ‘nindāya’miccādinā.
anya-e0806n4:173_0: Sīlamassa atthi, kesā assa santīti viggaho. Aṇṇā niccanti niccavidhyutthaṁ gaṇasuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:173_1: Gāṇḍīrājīhi saññāyanti saññāvisayaniyamanatthaṁ gaṇasuttaṁ. Gaṇḍassa gaṇḍamigasiṅgassa
anya-e0806n4:173_2: ayaṁ gāṇḍī, sā assa atthīti gāṇḍīvo.
anya-e0806n4:177_0: Akārādeso ca ṇasanniyogenāti iminā yattha ṇakāro tatthevāyamakārādesoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n4:177_1: Upādānatoti iminā nissayakaraṇameko satthiyo ñāyoti dasseti. Antassa avidhānasāmatthiyācāti
anya-e0806n4:177_2: iminā satipi pubbalopena payoga nipphattiyaṁ akāraṁ vidhāya tassa lopo niratthakoti
anya-e0806n4:177_3: dasseti. Lakkhī sirī assa atthīti lakkhaṇo.
anya-e0806n4:179: Kappo yogyatā assa atthīti kappiyo, jaṭā hānabhāgo, senā assa atthīti viggaho.
anya-e0806n4:181_0: ‘Ohāka cāge’ iti sakakārassa hādhātuno payoge toppaccayaṁ nisedhetvā‘satthā hīyate
anya-e0806n4:181_1: satthā hīno’ti udāharaṇaṁ dassitaṁ. Tenāha- ‘sakkateccādi. Dassetuṁ tatiyampanudāharaṇanti
anya-e0806n4:181_3: vutto cīppaccayo avasāne ye santi viggaho. Jātiyavajjitānanti ‘‘tabbati jātiyo’’ti
anya-e0806n4:181_4: (4-113) suttena jātiyappaccayena vajjitānaṁ. Kaccāyane tu toādīnaṁ vibhatti saññattā
anya-e0806n4:183: Vuttiyaṁ ‘etassa ṭa eta’ iti atoiccatra etassa ṭādeso etto iccatra etaādesoti attho.
anya-e0806n4:185_0: Nanu ca kiṁ iminā suttena, pañcamyantā ‘‘to pañcamyā’’ti (4-95) bhavissati, apañcamyantātu
anya-e0806n4:185_2: kutoci pañcamyantā hotu, apañcamyantā pana ‘‘ādyādīhī’’ti sutte sasaṅkhyassādisaddassa
anya-e0806n4:185_3: gahaṇena taṁsadisā sasaṅkhyāevopalakkhīyantītipi viññāyeyya tato apañcamyantehi abhyādīhi
anya-e0806n4:185_4: to na siyāti abhitoccādi na sijjhatīti ‘‘abhyādīhī’’ti suttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:187_0: Nanu ca toicceva sāmaññena suttite yatokutoci pañcamyantā vā apañcamyantā vā bahulaṁ
anya-e0806n4:187_1: vā tomhi iṭṭhappasiddhīti kiṁ ādyādīhīti suttenāti saccaṁ, tathāpi vibhāgena dassite
anya-e0806n4:187_2: vibhāgaso visesāvasāyo siyāti na dosoti. Yanti paṭhamantā tomhi yato.
anya-e0806n4:189: Pubbenevāti ‘‘sabbādito’’ (4-99) ccādināva. Etassāti etasaddassa, imassāti imasaddassa.
anya-e0806n4:193: Yatrāti vutte yatthāti uppalakkhitameva siyāti na vuttaṁ. Evamuparipi.
anya-e0806n4:195: Hiñcanaṁ vidhīyate ‘‘hiṁ haṁ hiñcana’’nti (2-5-9) suttena. Hiñciādīnanti hiñcidācirahaciādīnaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:201_0: Nimittanimittīnanti kāraṇakāriyānaṁ, samāneti sādhāraṇe. Samānameva bodheti ‘taṁyathe’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n4:201_1: Ettha pana mammatāḷanaṁ nimittaṁ pāṇa haraṇaṁ nimittī, tassāti anajjatanassa. Upari
anya-e0806n4:201_2: tyādikaṇḍe karahasaddo tu cisaddasaṁyuttova dissati karahacīti.
anya-e0806n4:203_0: Saṅkhyāvācino saddā saṅkhyāsaddena gahitāti āha- ‘atthe’ccādi. Pakāro dabbaguṇadhisayopi
anya-e0806n4:203_1: atthi, tattha yadi sopi gayheyya dabba guṇānaṁ liṅgasaṅkhyāhi yogā dhāppaccayanta(mpi
anya-e0806n4:203_3: dhāppaccayantamaliṅgamasaṅkhyañca-iti kāsikāvuttipañjakāyaṁ na siyā, evañca satyabyayattamabhimatantassa
anya-e0806n4:203_4: na siyā, tañciṭṭhaṁ, kiriyāvisaye tu tasmiṁ gayhamāne ekadhābhuñjati dvidhābhuñjati
anya-e0806n4:203_5: dvidhāgacchaticcādo bhojana gamanādikiriyāya sabbathā liṅgasaṅkhyāhi yogābhāvā yathāvutta
anya-e0806n4:203_6: doso na siyāti pāṇinīyavuttikārena jayādiccena kiriyā visayoyevettha pakāro gahito.
anya-e0806n4:204_0: Tattha puthabyāpotejovāyvākāsakāladisāttamanānīti nava dabbāni. Rūpa rasa gandha
anya-e0806n4:204_2: ca guṇā, casaddena gurutta davattasinehasaṅkhāradhammādhammasaddā ceti catubbīsati
anya-e0806n4:204_3: bahudhā guṇo. Atrāpi yathāvuttakāsikāvuttiyā pañcikākārena jinindabuddhinā navadhā
anya-e0806n4:204_4: dabbaṁ bahudhā guṇotyatrāpi ‘‘kiriyājjhāharitabbā navadhā dabbaṁ bahudhā guṇo upadisīyati
anya-e0806n4:204_5: viññāyati byākhyāyate vijjatevā’’ti kiriyāvisayoyeva pakāro paṭipādito, payogadassanato
anya-e0806n4:205_0: Navadhā dabbaṁ bahudhā guṇoti payogadassanato dabbaguṇavisayānampakārānaṁ gayhupagattā
anya-e0806n4:205_2: jinindabuddhinā vuttanayena kiriyā atthevāti kiriyāvisayova pakāro gayhatīti vuttikāra
anya-e0806n4:206_0: Tatoyevāti yato visesanopādānamayuttaṁ tatoyeva dvīhiccādikamāheti attho. Ayametthādhippāyo
anya-e0806n4:206_1: ‘‘dvidhā karotīti kiriyāpayogepi pakāro dabbaguṇavisayo… dabbavisayassa guṇavisayassa
anya-e0806n4:206_2: vā dvidhābhāvassa karīyamānattā, natu kiriyāvisayo… dvidhābhāvassa karaṇakiriyāvisayassettha
anya-e0806n4:206_3: vattumanicchitattā. Tatoyeva kiriyāpakāropādāne pakārotisayane (potthake) atra dhāppaccayantappayogo
anya-e0806n4:207_0: Dabbaguṇavisaye pakāre gayhamāne yoyaṁ doso sambhāvito parehi, taṁ dāni nirākattumāha
anya-e0806n4:207_2: dhāppaccayo vihito pāṇiniyehi, tadāha- ‘dabbasse’ccādi saṅkhyāntarāpādanepīti pubbaṁ
anya-e0806n4:207_3: yā vavatthitā saṅkhyā, tato- ññaṁ saṅkhyāntaraṁ tassāpādanaṁ karaṇaṁ saṅkhyantarāpādanaṁ, tasmimpīti attho.
anya-e0806n4:209: So pakāro assāti tabbā, tasaddena pakārassa parāmaṭṭhattā tabbatītettha pakāravatīti attho vuttoti āha- ‘tasaddene’ccādi. Pakāravatīti pakāravati atthe. Muduppakāravā mudujātiyo.
anya-e0806n4:211_0: Kiṁ saṅkhyānamparimāṇamesanti atthe ‘‘kimhā rati rīvarīvataka rittakā’’ti (4-44)
anya-e0806n4:211_1: suttena ratippaccayaṁ vidhāya katīti siddhattā vuttaṁ- ‘saṅkhyāparimāṇavisaye sādhitattā’ti,
anya-e0806n4:211_2: kati ca so saṅkhyā parimāṇavisayattā saṅkhyā ceti katisaṅkhyā, tāya.
anya-e0806n4:213: Paccāsattīti sambandhimhi ekamhi dassite dviṭṭhattā sambandhassa paro sambandhī viññāyamāno parova viññāyati yuttitoti ‘sambandhatovā’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:217: Khaṇḍaṁ khaṇḍaṁ khaṇḍaso, puthu pakāro puthuso.
anya-e0806n4:219_0: Nanu ca abhavanannāma sabbathā anuppattiyā vā avatthantarena vā, tathā satyabhūtasaddo-nuppannamattavacanopīti
anya-e0806n4:219_2: tasaddena parāmasīyatīti ce abhūtasaddo yadyanuppannavācī siyā, tadā tasaddappa yogoyeva
anya-e0806n4:219_3: na siyā… tasaddenābhūtasseva gahaṇato, abhūtabhāveccādinā suttitaṁ siyā, tena tasaddappayogasāmatthiyā
anya-e0806n4:219_4: avatthāva tasaddena parāmasīyati, tapparāmaṭṭhañcāvatthantaramabhūta saddo apekkhate,
anya-e0806n4:219_5: tenāha- ‘tabbhāvetivacanā’iccādi. Bhavanaṁ bhāvo tāya avatthantare bhāvo tabbhāvo
anya-e0806n4:219_6: tasmiṁ. Tenāha ‘abhūtasse’ccādi. Bhāveti visayasattamī, saṁsattamī vāti āha- ‘visaye
anya-e0806n4:221_0: Dissantīti vutte payoge dissantīti ayamattho viññāyatīti āha ‘disi’ccādi, idaṁ suttaṁ
anya-e0806n4:221_1: vijjhaṅga paribhāsā bhavatīti seso. ‘‘Ṇovā-pacce’’tiādinā (4-1) suttena vuttesvanekavidhesu
anya-e0806n4:221_2: atthesu pari samantato bhāsatīti paribhāsā, vidhino paccayassa aṅgabhūtā paribhāsā
anya-e0806n4:223_0: Antarasaddo-nekatthopīhāntarāḷavācī majjhavācī gayhati, na vijjatentaramesanti antarāḷamattapaṭisedhepayojanaṁ
anya-e0806n4:223_1: natthīti katvāntarā ḷaṭṭhassābhāvāntarāḷaṁ natthītyupacarīyati, evañhi loke payujjate
anya-e0806n4:223_2: ‘anantarā ime gāmā anantarā ime pāsādā’ti antarāḷagatassa ññassa gāmassaññassa pāsādassa
anya-e0806n4:223_4: anantarā ityuccante, athavāntarasaddo byavadhānavācī byavadhānābhāvato-nantarā iti
anya-e0806n4:223_5: vuccante. Antaraṁ karotīti vā khādiippaccayaṁ ṇippaccayaṁ (potthake) vidhāya antarāyati
anya-e0806n4:223_6: byavadhānaṁ karotīti kattari appaccayaṁ vidhāya antaro byavadhāyako natthetesanti
anya-e0806n4:223_7: anantarā. Yathā ‘rukkhā vanante’ttha rukkhā samuditāvekavanabyapadesaṁ labhante,
anya-e0806n4:224_0: Saṁyogoti hi samudāyappadhāno niddeso byañjanātyavayavappadhāno, tasmā byañjanāti
anya-e0806n4:224_1: bahuvacanena saṁyogoti ekavacananiddeso ghaṭate, nanu ca vaṇṇānamuccāritappadhaṁsittā
anya-e0806n4:224_2: yogapajjamaṭṭhitamānānaṁ na sambhavati samudāyattanti samudāyattamayuttanti nāyuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:224_3: tathāhi uttaruttaraggāhini buddhi pubbaparībhūte byañjanāvayave samudāyarūpena saṅkappentī
anya-e0806n4:225_0: Ṇānubandheti ditisaddassa saṁyogāvisayattā deccoti ‘sarānamādissā’ti visayo, uḷumpasaddassa
anya-e0806n4:225_1: saṁyogavisayattā oḷumpikoti etassa visayoti tattha rāghavo venateyyo meniko decco
anya-e0806n4:225_2: dosaggānti rūpāni. Idha tu oḷumpiko koṇḍaññoti yujjanti. Teneva ca tattha pañcikā
anya-e0806n4:225_3: ettha, ettha ca pañcikā tattha upanetabbāti.
anya-e0806n4:227: Kosajjanti ettha tassa jattañca nipātanā, ajjavanti etthha ‘‘uvaṇṇassā vava sare’’ti (4-129).
anya-e0806n4:233_0: Satissāti vutte satisaddo viññāyati satyantepi visesanattena vattumicchitesatyanto
anya-e0806n4:235: Dhātuto añño saddo adhātu tassa. Pañcikāyampana pakatipi saddoyevāti dhātutoiccādinā adhātusaddassa atthamattaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:236_0: Tassāti adhātuppakatiyā, adhātusaddassāti vuttaṁ hoti. Tenacāti kakārena ca, tasmāti
anya-e0806n4:236_1: tena kāraṇena. Pubbaggahaṇamantarenātipāṇininā ikārādesavidhāyake imasmiṁyeva suttekakārato
anya-e0806n4:236_2: pubbassa ikārādesavidhānatthaṁ pubbaggahaṇaṁ kataṁ, taṁ pubbassātivacanaṁ vināti
anya-e0806n4:236_3: attho. Sacetiādinā kathayatīti sambandho. ‘‘Byañjane dīgharassā’’ti (1-33) rasso
anya-e0806n4:236_4: vutto, assāti jātiniddese tu ākārassacikāro bhavatyeva, siyā etanti bahuparibbājakāti
anya-e0806n4:236_5: etaṁ rūpaṁ hoti. Syādyatra byavahito… kakārato pubbe syādi, na syādi kakārā paroti.
anya-e0806n4:237_0: Nanu ca asyāditoti ettha pasajjappaṭisedho naña kasmā gahito, na pariyudosoti āsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n4:237_1: pariyudāsesmiṁ gahite sati dosaṁ vattumārabhate ‘pariyudāse’iccādinā. Syāditoti syādyantato
anya-e0806n4:237_2: paribbājakasaddato. Paribbājakasaddohi syādyanto vākye syādyantattā, teneva vakkhati-
anya-e0806n4:237_3: ‘paribbājakasaddato ettha syādyuppattī’ti. Asyādismā paroti katvā bahuparibbājakasaddato
anya-e0806n4:238: Tatocāti bahuparibbājakasaddato ca. Pasajjappaṭisedhena nañasaddena aññapadatthasamāsepi siyāva dosoti dassento āha- ‘avijjamānosyādi’ccādi.
